name: The Last Beacon
description:
Controls:
WASD - Movement 
LShift - Rewind 
Left Mouse - Attack

In this game you must protect the last beacon of light from the encroaching darkness using the power given to you by the light.

This is a game made for a small Gam Jam between friend randomizing the themes from previous game jams that we were not able to attend. Our random rolls landed on: Rewind.

My goal with this game was to learn about the features of Unity available in the Universal Render Pipeline such as Shader Graph and VFX Graph, and to get more comfortable with 3D models and animations.
